title: Melanie Lynskey Yellowjackets Interview Special
content: This is an interview special in honour of the extremely talented, utterly charming and truly delightful Melanie Lynskey. Currently she’s in Yellowjackets, the Paramount+ show about a high school soccer (that is to say, football) team who, in the '90s, survive a horrific plane crash that leaves them stranded in the Canadian wilderness, struggling to survive, stay warm, stay sane, and, um, stay fed. It's... not a comedy. Melanie, however, is an utter joy, and here's the interview to prove it.

itunes.author: BBC Radio 1
itunes.subtitle: Ali chats with star of Yellowjackets (and many, many more shows) Melanie Lynskey.
